job_description:
• Experience with data analysis or scripting to accelerate simulations (e.
• , Python with NumPy or Pandas) Familiarity with FineSim and/or HSPICE, SystemVerilog, and scripting languages (Python/Tcl/Perl) Strong analytical problem-solving skills and ability to work in cross-disciplinary teams Familiarity with memory design (DRAM/HBM/SRAM) and SoC/IO interfaces Pursuing a degree in Electrical Engineering or a related field Experience reading schematics, timing diagrams, and RTL Clear written and verbal communication skills Intern - HBM Design EngineerRichardson, Texas, United States of AmericaPosted 20 hours ago Principal HBM Design EngineerAtlanta, Georgia, United States of AmericaPosted 4 months ago Intern - HBM Design EngineerRichardson, Texas, United States of AmericaPosted 11 days ago.

• Partner with Product Engineering, Test, Probe, Process Integration, Assembly, and Marketing to ensure manufacturability and performance Collaborate with layout teams to meet floorplanning, placement, and routing requirements Maintain technical expertise through continuous training and cross-group communication Ability to convey complex technical concepts clearly in verbal and written form Familiarity with schematic entry and simulation using FineSim and/or HSPICE Experience working in a collaborative, fast-paced engineering environment Effective communication skills for multi-functional collaboration Experience with scripting languages (Python, TCL, Perl, etc.
• ) Familiarity with DRAM memory concepts and SoC/IO interfaces Basic knowledge of CMOS circuit design and device physics.
